Strings.Text: It's too dark to see...\nWill you jump down?{scroll 1}{branch 0 6 0}
There's a rope...\nWill you descend it?{scroll 1}{branch 0 6 0}
{scroll 0}How about going down to\ncheck by yourself?{scroll 2}{clear 87}{scroll 0}\nI have a rope here.{scroll 2}{timed 43}
{scroll 0}Oh do you? Well, then I'll try\nto go down using the rope.{scroll 2}{timed 120}
{scroll 0}Yeah, Richard gave this\nto me.{scroll 2}{clear 55}{scroll 0}The radio is a keepsake\nfrom him.{scroll 2}{timed 105}
{scroll 0}This is more useful to you\nthan me.{scroll 2}{clear 70}{scroll 0}\nReady to go?{scroll 2}{timed 40}
{scroll 0}Now I've done it.\nSorry, Jill.{scroll 2}{clear 85}{scroll 0}Wait, I'll go and\nget another rope.{scroll 2}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}\nHey! Are you there, Jill?{scroll 2}{clear 80}{scroll 0}\nGrab the rope!{scroll 2}{timed 70}
{scroll 0}I didn't know that was\ngoing to happen.{scroll 2}{clear 95}{scroll 0}Sorry, I was really\ncareless.{scroll 2}{timed 90}
{scroll 0}\nAre you okay, Barry?{scroll 2}{clear 65}{scroll 0}\nMaybe you're getting tired.{scroll 2}{timed 65}
There's a switch below...\nWill you push it?{scroll 1}{branch 0 6 0}
There's a rope...\nWill you climb it?{scroll 1}{branch 0 6 0}
There's a ladder...\nWill you descend it?{scroll 1}{branch 0 6 0}
{scroll 2}Touch the grave, take up\nthe sword, and be brave!{clear 0}{scroll 2}Touch the gravestone? {branch 0 6 1}
{scroll 2}An old phonograph.\nThe handle is broken.{clear 0}{scroll 2}Spin record by hand?{branch 0 6 1}
